div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1609 Gaza Environs, Judaea, 1969 Burial: c. 95 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 52+ AR Cleopatra and Antiochus VIII: 2 tetradr.; 3 didr. (Ascalon) Antiochus VIII: 39 tetradr.; 3 didr. (Asca- lon, latest legible date 209 = 103 B.C.) Antiochus IX: 2 tetradr. (Ascalon, yr. 200) Ascalon: 2 tetradr. (yr. 6?) Disposition: A. Spaer, Jerusalem Information from A. Spaer
